name: amfTrop
description: Tropospheric air mass factor for total tropospheric NO2 calculated by WRF-Chem

name: amfTropVis
description: Tropospheric air mass factor for visible tropospheric NO2 calculated by WRF-Chem

name: swClr
description: Clear-sky box tropospheric air mass factor based on LUT

name: swCld
description: Cloudy-sky box Tropospheric air mass factor based on LUT

name: avgKernel
description: Averaging kernel computed for the weighted average of cloudy and clear conditions

name: no2apriori
description: NO2 a priori profile used for each pixel. Pressure levels given in plevels

name: no2Trop
description: Tropospheric NO2 VCD including estimated ghost column (scdTrop/amfTrop)

name: no2TropVis
description: Tropospheric NO2 VCD with only visible NO2 included (scdTrop/amfTropVis)
